item.description:
This meetup is for GMs to recruit, players to find a game, and anyone who isn't sure to just come and see who's interested in what. Whether you've been planning a Star Wars campaign for months or you're jonesing for some GURPS but are willing to run some Vampire, come out and see who else is looking for GMs/players. This meetup is happening at Your Move Games, a store in Davis Square that has gaming space you can use if you want to get started right away, or you can just meet people here, get some e-mails, and schedule something elsewhere later.

I personally am looking for beginner-to-medium-experienced players for a D&D 3.5 campaign:
Evil stalks through the city of Saltmarsh. Are you brave enough to walk the roads of Saltmarsh, face the intrigues of Saltmarsh... serve a Lady of Saltmarsh? She seeks four heroes capable of navigating the streets, swamps, and perhaps even the sea. Sign up for a campaign offering adventures of all kinds and rewards for those who earn them. This D&D 3.5 campaign is run by a DM more concerned with your characters than your character stats. If you're a creative, smart person, come to the meetup or send an e-mail with a character idea to ElfWord@gmail.com.

If you're a GM that intends to come to this meetup recruiting for a specific campaign, e-mail me with a one-paragraph blurb and I'll update the meetup info with it.

PLEASE RSVP! "No" is fine, but help the organizers serve you better by indicating what times/locations would be better for you.
item.name: Campaigns Recruiting in Davis Square!
